name: assign_thermostats_basedon_standards_building_typeand_standards_space_type
display_name: Assign Thermostats Basedon Standards Building Typeand Standards Space Type
name_xml: Assign Thermostats Based on Standards Building Type and Standards Space Type
modeler_description: The wizard we are working on writes out thermostats and setpoint schedules along with space types. This measures attempts to re-wire them together later on after thermal zones have been assigned, as we can't directly assign thermostats to space types.
description: This will loop through zones, and when all spaces in the zone share the same space type, will look for a properly named thermostat to assign.
